rooms.description: Open concept living area with abundant natural light and cross ventilation.
Adjacent to the kitchen for ease of entertaining; large windows for ventilation.
Efficient layout with work triangle design and plenty of natural light from an adjacent window.
Space for food prep and transitional area between kitchen and dining room.
Functional layout with tiled surfaces; includes a window for natural light.
Master bedroom on the ground floor with a spacious balcony ensuring privacy and ventilation.
Two-car garage integrated into the design to accommodate vehicles; includes storage space.

openings.description: Main entrance door with sidelights to enhance natural light and align with Vastu principles.
Large window in the living room for ample morning sunlight and ventilation.
Window in the dining room to balance light distribution.
Balconies attached to each bedroom for outdoor views and fresh air.

rooms.description: Bedroom with spacious balcony ensuring privacy and natural light; includes Vastu-compliant positioning.
Additional bedroom with an integrated balcony for ventilation.
Smaller bedroom suitable for guest use; includes a modest balcony for fresh air.
Fully equipped bathroom with natural light through window placement.

openings.description: Central staircase designed for ease of movement between floors, complying with Vastu principles.
Window in the master bedroom to enhance early morning light and ventilation.
